t:
As the Zulgans creep through the trees around me, I wait silently in the dark with my blaster ready to fire.


As their long, slender legs go still, I open fire. As the plasma lights the surrounding, I realize...


                            ... those weren't trees.
c:
This exploration was the first bad choice we made.



Write a #shortstory titled #badchoice that tell the story of the bad choice you made in life.  #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





#scifishortstory #alien #tree #dangerous #trapped
